ai-thag1.7:1.1_0: “One who has compassion for Death, King,
ai-thag1.7:1.2_0: as a great flood, a fragile bridge of reeds.
ai-thag1.7:1.3_0: Victorious since his fears have vanished:
ai-thag1.7:1.4_0: tame and steadfast, he has become extinguished.
ai-thag1.7:1.5_0: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
